item.title: Dynamic resume's built in R with the vitae package
item.description: A couple of months ago I came across the vitae package which was recently developed by Mitchell Oâ€™Hara Wild. I have been using the same basic resume template for over 10 years, mainly by default, but I really liked the layout offered by one of the vitae templates and the ability to build it with R Markdown turned a chore into something fun to do (keeping the resume current).
